subject: Super Bowl
Mardi Gras
Football
lead_paragraph: While Eli Manning, a New Orleans hometown hero, was the Giants in the Super Bowl, hundreds of thousands of conflicted Carnival revelers tried to balance their desire to see the big game with watching the big parade.
snippet: While Eli Manning, a New Orleans hometown hero, was the Giants in the Super Bowl, hundreds of thousands of conflicted Carnival revelers tried to balance their desire to see the big game with watching the big parade.
